Centimètre par cemtimètre, ils repoussèrent les Petits Orcs du Père Noël cédant du terrain lentement, luttant au service de ce maléfique homme jovial, mais leur volonté donna cèdera bientôt face au défenseur de la justice.
La journée touchait à sa fin, mais l'assaut final vers la Tanière du Père Noël était encore à venir.

Mais, là où il était fort, J'étais faible.

Vous voyez, mon grand-père n'a jamais pu finir le Neuvième String de la Vertu. Sa vision n'a jamais été réalisée en raison de l'ingérence de la direction générale, qui a corrompu les Strings au départ.
Mais je ne pouvais pas me résoudre à détruire les Strings. Ils étaient maléfique et corrompu, mais il y avait du bon en eux, si vous regardiez à travers tout leur vices.
Alors, j'ai caché les Strings dans un endroit où ils ne seraient jamais trouvés. Peut-être qu'un jour je les terminerai. Peut-être.
Mais aujourd'hui, je vieillis, et mon récit arrive finalement à sa fin.
J'ai une autre histoire à raconter. L'histoire de comment tout a commencé. Mais je suis fatigué, et je dois me reposer.
Sandy est morte ce jour-là comme une véritable héroïne. Une héroïne donneuse de leçon, corrompue, ennuyeuse, mais une héroïne quand même.

Mais, le monde a besoin d'un héros pour détruire ces Strings.

...a boulder, a tree, a house, even a mountain...+

...humans had no choice but to live with their physical weaknesses.

There are many weapons I can use, at any time and in any location. Assign weapons anyplace easy to reach, or esthetically pleasing.
DeathSpank has many friends! Plugging in a second controller will allow another adventurer to join the game and defend justice.
Sparkles the Wizard is an old friend that can drop in to help me dish out justice. He can inflict pain on our enemies with fire, or even heal me when I'm in battle. All around, a swell guy.
Assisting me is the amazing Tankko! Half-man, half-monster, all awesome! He can spit poison, spin webs, and drain life from enemies.
If an enemy is displaying its name with a cute little health bar, it's my current target. You can then smash that enemy to the ground.
Consume Fortune Cookies to unlock hints on how to complete quests. They're great for adventurers on calorie-reduced diets.
The world is a dangerous place full of dangerous stuff to do! Seek out people in need and complete their quests to feel good, and to get some pretty swell rewards.
My quest log shows a variety of important and unimportant quests! Important quests relate to the Thongs of Virtue and saving the world!
Sometimes busy heroes overlook things. These things then find their way to dumpsters. I've never figured out how, and it's not important.
Skillfully alternate weapons to build Justice quicker! Enemies go down faster when hit with many different weapons.
Follow this handy advice closely to succeed in adventuring.
Use Weapons Of Justice when the Justice Meter is full. Fill the Meter by hitting enemies, and then smother them in rich creamy Justice.
Leveling up strengthens my abilities and gives me a new hero card. Do it early! Do it often!
Recovering Thongs got you down, citizen? Maybe this handy tip will help you out.
Over time adventurers gain a greater understanding of inserting weaponry. As I level up, make sure I'm using the latest and greatest weapons around!
Every time I level up I get a Hero Card! Hero Cards customize my abilities and collecting them is pretty addictive.
The very Gods of Justice feel that you should know this information. So read it!
Enemy attacks can be avoided by heroically blocking. Blocking protects me from all attacks and most criticism.
This message is also a tutorial. Enjoy!

Forged in the ancient Fires of Bacon, a master craftsman created six symbols of virtue and gave them to the purest of humans.
Six noble Thongs to stand against evil and remake the world as it once was.
The Thong of Courage was bequeathed to a fearless prince to bind us together.
The Thong of Compassion given to a devoted nun, so we could all care again.
The Thong of Peace was entrusted to a subject who would do anything to prevent war and suffering.
To Santa Claus went the Thong of Generosity, to brighten the young with hope.
The Thong of Cuisine was given to a popular television chef.
And finally, the most powerful Thong of them all, the Thong of Justice, was gifted to a valiant knight, to watch over the weak and requite the wicked.
Together, these men and women were known as The Order of the Thong.
But humans are ambitious and wishful and always desire more and the Thongs corrupted those who wore them, turning virtues into vices.
Turning the power of the Thongs against us all.
Spared from the fate of evil was the valiant knight, whose Thong was lost.
This Thong was never seen again.
Present at the forging of the six Thongs a generation ago was the granddaughter of the master craftsman, who knew the Thongs were too powerful for man to wear and must be destroyed.

She dedicated her life to finding the Thongs of Virtue and destroying them in the only remaining Fires of Bacon, found in a desolate place at the end of humanity, beyond the reach of the evil that is man.
One by one she sought the Thongs, but The Order fought hard to keep that which corrupted and controlled their souls.
It is a battle that is waged to this very day.
What was the fate of the Thong of Justice?
Lost for all time?
Never to be found?
